backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout rendering header, hero, gallery, footer, and rain background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, animated heart icon, and a poetic snowflake quote.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Snowflake gallery with modal dialogs and hover animations for six images.
frontend/src/components/HailBackground.t: Empty placeholder file intended for hail background component.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header displaying title and animated snowflake icons.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with text celebrating the beauty and uniqueness of snowflakes.
frontend/src/components/RainBackground.t: Canvas-based animated rain effect with raindrop generation, motion, scaling, and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/SnowfallBackgrou: Empty placeholder file for snowfall background component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing ICP Internet Identity login, persistence, and status using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark winter-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and imports global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions for design tokens, color mappings, plugins, and dark-mode support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
